sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- 编辑弹框 -->
      <a-modal
      title="编辑机器人命令集"
      style="top: 20px;"
      :width="600"
      v-model="visible"
      :destroyOnClose="true"
      @ok="handleSubmit"
    >
    <a-form :form="form">
        <a-form-item
        label="命令集"
        :labelCol="labelCol"
        :wrapperCol="wrapperCol">
        <a-select
            showSearch
            placeholder="选择命令集"
            optionFilterProp="children"
            :filterOption="filterOption"
            v-decorator="[
              'cmd',
              {rules: [{ required: true,message: '请选择' }],
              initialValue: editData.cmd}
            ]"
        >
            <a-select-option v-for="(item ,key) in cmdList" :key="key" :value="item.id">
              {{item.name}}
            </a-select-option>
        </a-select>
        <a-button type="primary" @click="$refs.cmd.show()">找不到合适的?点击配置命令集</a-button>
      </a-form-item>
    </a-form>
    
    <!-- <cmd-list ref="cmd"></cmd-list> -->
    </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
import { addData, queryData } from '@/api/common'
import { STable } from '@/components'
// import CmdList from './Cmd'

export default {
  name: 'TableList',
  components: {
    STable,
    // CmdList
  },
  data() {
    return {
      labelCol: {
        xs: { span: 24 },
        sm: { span: 7 }
      },
      wrapperCol: {
        xs: { span: 24 },
        sm: { span: 13 }
      },
      visible: false,
      confirmLoading: false,
      cmdList:[],
      editData:[],
      cmd:'',
      form: this.$form.createForm(this),
      showIframe:false
    }
  },
  created(){
    this.getCmd()
  },
  methods: {
    show(record) {
      // console.log(record)
      this.editData = record
      this.visible = true
    },
    // 命令集iframe
    showCmd(){
        this.showIframe = true;
    },
    getCmd(){
      let org = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')).orgId;
      let _this = this;
      queryData({orgId:org},'/cmdCollection/getCmdListByOrg').then(res => {
        console.log(res)
        if(res.code == 0){
          _this.cmdList = res.cmdList
        } else {
          _this.$message.error(res.message)
        }
      });
    },
    handleSubmit() {
      const { form: { validateFields } } = this
      this.confirmLoading = true
        validateFields((errors, values) => {
        if (!errors) {
          var _this = this;
          setTimeout(() => {
              let param = {id:this.editData.id,cmd:values.cmd}
            addData(param,'/faceManage/editRobotFace').then(res => {
              
              if(res.code == 0){
                _this.$message.success('修改成功');
                // 重置输入框内容
                _this.form.resetFields();
                this.visible = false
                this.confirmLoading = false
                this.$emit('ok', values)
              } else {
                _this.$message.error(res.message)
              }
            });
            
          }, 300)
        } else {
          this.confirmLoading = false
        }
      })
    },
    filterOption(input, option) {
      return option.componentOptions.children[0].text.toLowerCase().indexOf(input.toLowerCase()) >= 0
    },
  }
}
</script>
<style>
.ant-upload-select-picture-card i {
  font-size: 32px;
  color: #999;
}

.ant-upload-select-picture-card .ant-upload-text {
  margin-top: 8px;
  color: #666;
}
.anticon anticon-eye-o {
  display: none;
}
.ant-upload-list-item-actions a {
  display: none;
}
</style>
